SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" @echo off : ELSE : DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER : ENDIF !------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_TDM.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "PublishDataAction"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_TDM.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_TDM.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_JOSN &UC4RB_TDM_CONFIG_JSON# = &UC4RB_TDM_JSON_CONTENT# : SET &UC4RB_TDM_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TDM_JSON_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_TDM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_TDM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TDM_CMD#, " -filePath &UC4RB_TDM_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: PRINT &UC4RB_TDM_CMD#
! Access key is decrypted and send to jar as argument : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_TDM_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "UNIX" export UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD : ENDIF
! Invoking java binary &UC4RB_TDM_CMD#
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** SUBMIT PUBLISH JOB ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** SUBMIT PUBLISH JOB ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_TDM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_TDM_JOBID*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_TDM_JOBID" : SET &UC4RB_TDM_JOBID# = "&VALUE#" : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_TDM_JOBID# = "" :ENDIF : PUBLISH &UC4RB_TDM_JOBID#,,"WORKFLOW"
